abilities.description: User can create, control, and transform into darkness at will, functioning like a black hole that absorbs everything.
abilities.limitations: Unlike typical Logia users, the user cannot let attacks pass through them. All damage is absorbed and amplified, causing greater pain than normal humans experience.

abilities.description: Creates a gravitational vortex of darkness that pulls everything into its center, destroying and absorbing all matter and energy.
Releases everything the darkness has previously absorbed, violently expelling debris and destroyed matter outward.
Upon physical contact with another Devil Fruit user, nullifies their powers, reducing them to ordinary humans. This is especially devastating against Logia-type users.

notableQuotes.quote: This is the power of darkness! Everything is absorbed into the void!
notableQuotes.speaker: Blackbeard
notableQuotes.context: Blackbeard demonstrates his Devil Fruit power

notableQuotes.quote: My Devil Fruit nullifies other powers upon contact. Your flames are useless against me!
notableQuotes.speaker: Blackbeard

trivia.fact: The Yami Yami no Mi is described as the 'most evil' Devil Fruit in existence.
Blackbeard spent decades on Whitebeard's ship specifically searching for this Devil Fruit, and murdered Thatch to obtain it.
Unlike other Logia fruits, the Yami Yami no Mi user cannot dodge attacks by turning into their element. Instead, the darkness absorbs all damage, with the user experiencing amplified pain.

abilities.description: A massive wave of fire that devastates everything in its path.
Fire attacks launched at opponents. Against Blackbeard's darkness, these flames cannot pass through as they would against normal opponents.
abilities.limitations: Cannot pass through Blackbeard's Yami Yami no Mi darkness.

abilities.description: Fire lances launched at the opponent with precision.
Cross-shaped flames that attack from multiple angles simultaneously.

abilities.abilityName: Dai Enkai: Entei (Great Flame Commandment: Flame Emperor)
abilities.description: Ace's ultimate technique. Creates a massive fireball resembling the sun at the tip of his finger, representing the pinnacle of his Mera Mera no Mi abilities.

trivia.fact: In Episode 325, Ace demonstrates his ultimate technique Dai Enkai: Entei for the first time, creating a fireball resembling the sun.
The Mera Mera no Mi's flames are absorbed by Blackbeard's Yami Yami no Mi instead of passing through, unlike typical Logia interactions.
